name: Kate Mueller
bio:
I've spent over ten years in tech writing and knowledge management, tackling everything from high-level concepts like researching best and worst practices to the hands-on work of proposing and building out knowledge bases or overhauling existing knowledge bases.

I've spent the last six years working with KnowledgeOwl, a knowledge base provider, writing most of their support documentation and advising knowledge base implementers and administrators on things like:

*   Getting buy-in

*   Shifting your culture to embrace better knowledge management

*   Defining needs and tooling requirements

*   Developing audit and review cycles

*   Creating authoring and publishing workflows
